title: Ticket #275: Cleanup / enhance tool output
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

Many of Dan's changes had to do with minor changes to the output of tools like condor_{status,q,history}. While some of these were just a matter of personal preference, many are also bona fide fixes to things like column alignment. He also added "human readable" suffixes for image sizes and such which is pretty cool.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (24).
creator: gquinn
